overview.name: Overview
overview.text: This product tour explores how the Joule copilot will elevate the employee experience by simplifying tasks and making it easier to find information and get answers to questions.
overview.imgAltText: Screenshot of intelligent visibility dashboard down to the sales order level
overview.bottomText: Take the next step and learn how the product can meet your business needs.
overview.finalSlideTitle: Ready to take the next step?

steps.text: Providing feedback doesn't come naturally to all employees. Joule helps employees by guiding them through the process of requesting and providing feedback.
Joule uses prompts to guide employees on providing meaningful, structured feedback.
Done! Within minutes, employees can become experts on giving meaningful, structured feedback.
Sometimes, you need to quickly find information, such as your cost center, but you aren't sure where to start.
Joule swiftly answers questions related to employees' profiles. Managers and HR representatives with certain permissions can also view other appropriate employee information.
Finding your latest salary information is simple with Joule.

content.imgAltText: Joule providing salary information to an employee.

steps.text: Navigating through the organization chart doesn't need to feel like a maze. With Joule, you can quickly explore the part of the organization you're interested in.

content.imgAltText: Employee asking for a list of direct reports

steps.text: Jumping to employee profiles right from the conversation with Joule makes navigation simpler and helps employees work faster.

content.imgAltText: Joule giving an employee information on direct reports.

steps.text: Changing an employee location, working time, name, pronoun, and other information is done in a guided way, without ever leaving a single screen.

content.imgAltText: Employee asking Joule to update a pronoun

steps.text: Once changes are made, they're reflected immediately on the employee profile.

Some managers delay the initiation of promotions or making needed changes in organizational information because of the effort involved. With help from Joule, managers can request employee promotions through a guided process.

content.imgAltText: Manager requesting Joule to initiate a promotion

steps.text: By setting an effective date for a promotion, managers don't need to create reminders for updating the system. The promotion will take place on the selected date in the future — or even the past.

content.imgAltText: Joule asking a manager to select the date for a promotion to take effect

steps.text: Even when Joule doesn't suggest the job role a manager is looking for, the manager can start typing the intended role and a new suggestion will appear.

content.imgAltText: Joule asking a manager to select the title for the promoted employee

steps.text: By interacting with Joule, approval workflows are part of the process, helping accelerate and simplify employee promotions.

content.imgAltText: Joule and a manager confirming a promotion is approved
